entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Sunday 12 March 2023
